name: Elk
description: The Elk is a large herbivore with a powerful body and impressive antlers, typically found in forests and grasslands.
memorable: The Elk's ability to charge with its ram attack, potentially knocking opponents prone, makes it a noteworthy creature in combat.
goals: Typically grazes on grasses and leaves, residing in herds within its natural habitat.
relations: Can be seen in herds, potentially alongside other forest and grassland creatures.
environment: Forests and grasslands, often in rugged terrains.
strengths: Highly mobile with the ability to deal significant damage through its ram attack and knockdown ability.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and intelligence limit its tactical options in combat.
attacks: Ram attack delivers bludgeoning damage and can knock opponents prone; Hooves attack targets immobilized foes for increased damage.
most_powerful_ability: Charge allows the Elk to deal additional damage and potentially knock its target prone if it has moved swiftly before the attack.
additional_information: Aggressive when threatened, using antlers for defense.
Symbol of untamed beauty in nature.
Common target for hunters due to its size and antlers.
test_queries: majestic creature that grazes on grass
animal that charges and can knock foes down
